actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from OMB, Labor Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs and Alcoholism

official_title: A bill to authorize States to determine the level of funds allotted to a State under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to be available for low-cost residential weatherization and other energy-related home repair projects for low-income households.

summary.text: Amends the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to eliminate the 15 percent cap on State expenditures for low-income residential weatherization and other energy-related repairs.

titles.title: A bill to authorize States to determine the level of funds allotted to a State under the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to be available for low-cost residential weatherization and other energy-related home repair projects for low-income households.
